title: 超能力MOD崩溃
author: iverson35
txt_content:
如题，超能力mod在加载时崩溃，换了多个版本依旧没有解决
MOD有
FLAN
高清修复
中文输入
AC
AC前置

电脑内存4GB







CRASH REPORT


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hey, that tickles! Hehehe!
Time: 18-4-14 上午11:42
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: eqwewer
replies.txt_content: forge版本过低，另外你的LambdaLib重复了。详见 https://ac.li-dev.cn/2016/12/17/academycraft-1-0-6-zhcn/
